scenario_text.value:
Professor, Renamon... You’re gonna go look
for Kaito and Dracumon?
Yes, exactly.

I must take action to make up for what I did.
I’ll find him if it’s the last thing I do.
Renamon...

Earlier you were overwhelmed with regret, but
now you seem done with all that.
That’s really impressive, Renamon!

I’ll try to follow his example and set aside
my own concerns.
Your own concerns? About what?
Regarding our discussion earlier.

I have to apologize. I was rather cold in
what I said.
Oh...

(I was honestly surprised. Suggesting we
should abandon Kaito!)

(It’s definitely not safe to keep looking for
him between enemies and the fog.)

(But did the professor just say that because
he wants to save his own skin?)
(I don’t want to even consider that...)
(I’d say the professor was just...)
Being realistic.
Focused on survival.
Being the “bad cop.”
Being realistic.

Considering where we’re at right now, I think
you were just being realistic.
We don’t want to abandon Kaito.

We made it this far together, but it’s all
for nothing if we lose anyone else.

I see... Your strong sense of justice may be
just what’s needed in this cruel world.
Focused on survival.

It was the natural thing to say if we want to
survive this mess.

As the adult in the room you’re thinking
about more than just your own safety.

It makes sense that you would prioritize the
survival of those here with us now.

Very mature of you. I’m glad you could
comprehend my line of thinking.
Being the “bad cop.”

You acted like the “bad cop” to say what the
rest of us were thinking, didn’t you?

You think too highly of me. I’m afraid
I can’t pull off such an elaborate act.

I just wanted to ensure the safety of those
of you with me here and now, that’s all.

No matter how you look at it, simply
“surviving” is not enough.

We also have to figure out how to help Miyuki
and bring her back...

(Between finding Kaito and saving Miyuki,
we’re got our work cut out for us.)

(And there’s no time to waste on either task.
We just have to make it work somehow.)

I want Kaito and Miyuki to know you care.
So whatever I can do toward that end...
